content.detailedDescription: On january 11, 2017 at approximately 2028 hours( 8:28 pm)  i was watching channel 35-1 ion when the antenna signal went out. after couple of seconds of turning chanels i noticed that all chanel's had no signal on their screen. i decided to exit my home and check the antenna. when i got out from the front door and looked up, i did not see anything wrong with the antenna, but when i glanced to the south west of my homes roof i observed a red orb like object that was approaching very steady and at a fast speed. within seconds the red orb got to the center top of my home and hovered for about 30 seconds pulsating very fast different shades of red color light. at the end of the 30 seconds it started moving up and west with the same fast speed and no sound that it came... i didn't have enough time to pick up a camera or even run inside to tell my son and wife. this will be the 3rd time that i have seen at a very close distance a red orb type of flying object over my home...
content.summary: Saw red orb hovering over home for a minute then moved west

content.detailedDescription:
my first experience was in 2002 in old orchard beach me it was 9pm i walked down to the square a meeting spot around 9:00pm it was close to the end of the season closer to fall, the wind was strong and the night was dark. when i got down to the center of the square i felt like everyone was moving in slow motion then i turned and immediately looked at this triangle ship over the roof top of the pizza place as i pointed and tried to yell look everything was moving like matrix super slow and i couldn't yell. then it was like someone hit a switch and everything was moving fast again. i stood at feeling extremely tired and was in shock then my friends pulled up get in they said so i did. and i couldn't believe what just happened still trying to process it. all i remember is going home around 1am and i slept for 2 days straight, i remember my mother having to tell work i was sick because i spelt for two full days. i'll never forget that night, and as the years went on i kept seeing new different objects in the sky at different times of my life. 
2015 was the big one and again as the 2016 and it's still happening. for me to go into full detail i could write another two pages. i reported the most recent to the center in maine.
content.summary: This sighting would be my third experience in the last 15 years i have more sightings and possible abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I am a retired steel mill superintendent. i was at home that night in september and i had just finished watching the weather on cbs news channel 6.  as i do every night i take my dog off the back elevated deck at my home to allow her to urinate before bed.  i had just climbed back up the stairs and was back on my deck latching the half-door. when i looked to the north-east and saw this huge oject traveling at a high rate of speed at a shallow angle to the south-west.  the obect was within my view for less than 35-40 seconds and dissappeared behind some large trees in my backyard.  i ran in and grabbed my camera but it was gone. i stood there over an hour and a half hoping to see it again. it never returned. i have looked for it every night since as i feel i need to see it again.

i am a 74 years old and have flown extensively and have had flight training flying light aircraft, cessna 180-150's. i am a vietnam era veteran and former paratrooper who spent hours and hours aboard helicopters and aircraft of all types. my eyesight is 20-20 still and i recognize most aircraft and am familiar with their appearance. i have never encountered anything like this object in my life. the interior hazy blue lights that were compartmentalized were like nothing i have seen.  they were a shimmering blue hazy appearance and i have not seen such a light except in hollywood sci-fy productions. the craft banked slightly as i watchced it and i was then that i was able to see the other light and the full shape of the triangle.

i have hesitated in reporting this as i have a very good reputation in my community and i do not wish to appear a looney old man who is losing his grip on sanity and reality.
content.summary: Large, triangular, very bright lights on each tip of the triangle, shimmering blue light in window compartments, no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Driving along hwy 82 west of sherman texas. looked up and saw it across hwy while driving.Struck me at first glance as a possible ufo.Was setting just slightly back of but just above power lines.Was tilted slightly backward, could not see top, but bottom was easliy observed. the object was fire engine red all around. shaped like a triangle with 3 lights in bottom about 12 in in diameter  had what looked like a alum bumper all around the ship about  8 to 12 wide extending out about 10 in. traffic was extreamly bad at that time so i could not stop. went down the hwy to next turn around and came back but ship was gone. it looked like they was collecting power from the power lines. did not move at all while i could see it. saw no wheels or landing gear.
content.summary: Sighted while driving east app 10-12 miles west of sherman texasdriving east alon hwy82 west of she

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my home sitting in my hot tube with my wife . i noticed it on a clear night when a very intense white light beamed on us a beam that was adjusted to the exact size of our hot tube i herd an click then a click off . when i first noticed it i thought a drone was their but being the sky was lite with stars i seen nothing as if the sky opened up light came on and then nothing .
the object was never seen or herd only a click from some power source . how i felt at the time was as if who or what was saying here i am you can't see me . at the time i was in the military and held a secret clearance so i asked around about what might have been in the area and everyone told me we don't have anything flying that low and or equipped with a light bean that advanced ( no beam adjustment ) .
content.summary: Sky opened up and white light very intense covered me

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling north on murray ridge road in lorain county at 12:48 am when i noticed a very bright orange pulsating light low to the horizon.  the road was empty so i stopped on the side of the road about maybe 1/4 mile from lowell street.  i had a digital slr camera with me with a 35-70mm lens and i started filming the event. you can hear my vehicle idling in the background and a talk show on my radio.  i tried zoom out to get perspective of the surroundings with the object however it was very dark, i did manage to get a tree with the object in view.  i knew the object was not an plane i worked at an airport in the past and i know the colors of the lights and patterns.  this was definitely something other than a jet or a plane.  i felt it was close enough that i should of heard an engine but far enough away that i would not be able to get much detail with my little lens.  i thought i should have brought my 300mm with me that night then it would have been real exciting.  i have always wanted to see a ufo and i was disappointed that i was not completely prepared.  i had just left a family party when the event happened and there were some people still there when i left.  when i mentioned i saw something the next day my older sister said she saw the same thing at about the same time i saw it.  she was about 5 miles away to the south from my location at the time which is the same direction the object was headed. i filmed until the light was just too far away to continue.  no cars came from in front of me or behind me while i was filming.  the metadata of the event on my camera had the date and time. my sister and i were the only ones i know of that saw the object and we were not together at the time.
content.summary: Pulsating orange light made no sound was not an aircraft moved about the speed of an aircraft or a bit faster

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my deceased dad looking up at the sky and saw this light moving erratically and i called my husband to look up. he said oh my gosh and we called news station but they didn't have a clue what we were seeing but i know what we saw. it just kept zipping up and down and back and forth unlike a star or satellite.
content.summary: My husband and i watched this thing go up zip down and around quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I had woken approximately 01:15, got up dressed came out to kitchen put kettle on for a cup of coffee, turned on tv sat down.

noticed a blue light through kitchen window, fanning from upper left to lower right of window.Kitchen blinds were half way up and open.

first thought it may have been a helicopter but no sound, would have to have a few feet off the ground.

the light was moving in a fanning motion at a shallow angle (10-15°) for what appeared to be a minute or so, they angle then changed to approximately 70-75° for approximately one minute when i observed a tall, very dark lanky and gangly being moving from right to left, being moved approximately 3/4 of window width, at which time i was getting up to go investigate unknown being in back yard. noted time on tv as 01:35am proceeding to get up when i noticed i was sitting back into couch and time on tv was 03:38am.
blue light was still evident although being no longer visible.
i got up went outside where everything was completely calm, still and no sounds at all. blue light had gone. looked around for a minute or two, came inside to get a cigarette went puts again where it was like someone having flicked a switch and all normal/natural sound had returned.
came back inside, sat for hours going over occurance, no resolution, went to bed, having a hard time sleeping since.
content.summary: Observed blie light through kitchen window, fanning from u/l to l/r, being then observed, went to go check, time lapse, found self sitting.

content.detailedDescription: On 18.12.16 23:00 i saw and photographed a strange, tubular shaded, smoke/vapour trial crossing over the face of the moon. it was unlike any other vape trail i seen before, it was different because it was going up, not over the sky like plane flumes do. in the end i took a picture.
content.summary: On 18.12.16 @ 23:00 i saw a strange trail over moon unlike any other i have witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: My parents live about 5 minuets from the bay/ ocean out side houston and i pretty much have grown up on the water day and night fishing, so used to seeing lights from coast guard, other fishermen night fishing, freight liners, jets scrambling out of air-force base near by, nasa testing jets, you name it as fishing and water plays a big part of our lives were out there often day or night. on dec. 22 around 11pm i decided to step outside to have a cigarette on the side patio, as soon as i opened the door i could see 2 large spotlights south east form my direction both searching in the air, the lights were so wide and bright that it had to be coming from either freight liner or the coast guard as nothing else on the water would normally have that big of lights unfortunately i was to far inland to see what was the exact source.  as i stood there about half way done with my cig 1 of the lights stopped moving and focused on something then the other light focused in on the same area and for around 15-25 seconds i could make out what seemed to be a light color almost dirty white color cone maybe pill shaped object directly in the center of the 2 spotlights,i had never seen anything that shape flying much less hovering  but as soon as i was able to focused in on the object it left faster then anything ive ever seen fly across the sky, in less then 3 seconds i went from facing south east to facing north west i only lost track of it due to the amount of distance it was covering in such a short time, the most amazing thing during this short experience was the trail it left behind, it was this pencil thin ultra bright blueish white light that stretched from the spotlights to well i dont know how far seemed to go on forever. after this the spothlights went back to searching the sky again for another minuet or so then turned off. by this point i was in shocked as i know i witness something out of the ordinary that night i told my girlfriend the next day but no one else, i thought about this event since its happened and at this point would like some kind of answer as to what was being spotlighted, and to the silent speed the object had while flying
content.summary: 2 spotlights from water catch ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was out at my farm in brookshire, tx checking on my horses around 9:00 pm. it was very dark and i did not have a flash light.  i was walking the fence line and happen to look off to the east and i noticed three very bright lights high in the sky probably about 5 miles away.  they where in a straight line extending away from me.  at first i thought they where airplanes or helicopters.  the lights where not blinking and they where a solid white color.  i lined them up with an electric pole on my property to see if they where moving.  i stood there for maybe 10 minutes and they did not seem to be moving.  then the light or orb farthest away from me moved at a very high rate of speed directly even with the others off to the right.  the other two did not move.  i looked away for a second trying to collect my thoughts and when i looked back only the two remained.  i then continued checking on the horses and went inside my farm house.  
i have seen these lights or orbs before and even pointed them out to my husband.
content.summary: I was outside checking on my horses when i noticed 3 very bright orbs off in the distance.   at first i thought they where planes but they didn't move.  then one of them darted off to the right very fast at the same level as the other two.

content.detailedDescription: I picked up my two sons from my ex wife's house and was bringing them home. i saw two separate sets of lights that i initially thought were two airplanes, one following the other coming towards us. as we got closer i realized they were hovering. there were lights that looked like wing lights on an airplane that were white and constantly on. there was a smaller flashing light in the center of the craft, red on one craft and white on the other. i pointed them out to my son's and as we got to the closest point that we could to them, pulled off the road. the closest one moved from a stationary point, banked and proceeded northeast. the other remained hovering for about 30-45 seconds, then banked in the same manner and followed the other craft. as it was night, we couldn't make out the shape or color but they were definitely hovering, the size of both objects were the same and the way they banked, it made them appear to be fixed wing crafts.
content.summary: Myself and sons witnessed two winged crafts hovering and then slowly bank and leave view

content.detailedDescription: i was making a time-lapse video of the sun coming up in the morning when i reviewed the video i noticed an object in the video it looks like it just appears then flys directly into the bright rising sun and disappears.  i'm not saying it's a ufo but it looks like an 80's flying saucer
content.summary: Filming out my bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
We were in the back yard after setting off a large display of fire works in the front yard.  

at first i thought it was a plan because we are located on a flight path, however i notice the object was moving perpendicular to the normal flight path.  that is when i yelled for my friend to come outside.  

it moved at a steady pace and and in a straight line then eventually dissipated.
content.summary: Appeared suddenly as a redish orange ball of ligh traveling at a steady speed then suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On the way home driving on the katy freeway near grand parkway had looked up at the sky and saw what looked like a blimp at first or something flying. we then realized it was not a blimp. the closer we drove towards it it looked farther away, yet it appeared to be in one place and hovering. it appeared to have this white glow around in a sideways egg shape. you could also see a couple of smaller red and blue lights flashing. it never appeared to be moving or doing anything, just hovering and staying in one place. although we drove towards it, we couldn't reach it at all. during the sighting we were really confused, but intrigued. having to ask each other if we were seeing the same thing which we were. we both came to the conclusion it was not a airplane or a blimp or anything that we could recognize. it had all the characteristics of a ufo. as we continued to drive home we just kept talking to each other and convinced we saw something out of the ordinary. and as we changed directions and headed home we got further and didn't look anymore.
content.summary: On way home saw an object in the sky hovering with a bright glow and red and blue flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was outside sipping sum tea wen my pap flew off the ground and i was like phew cause i couldn't whistle with no teeth, my sister aka my wife also flew off the ground into the large testicle. she was then objected from the orb covered in white gooey substance. she stuck to the ground and is still there to this day. the orb then flew off and landed in the corn field out back, then it started hopping around emitting beams of white light as far as i could see. then military helicopters and trucks came out and started searching the area. it might have been a military exercise but i could not tell you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A large testicle

content.detailedDescription: My so and i were on our way home when i noticed this huge object coming towards us. at first i thought it was a hand glider but as it got closer it clearly was not a hand glider. this object was big. it was not a drone. it did not make any noise. it was going at a steady pace. i was driving so i had my son take the picture. i have never seen anything like it. i do not even know how to describe.
content.summary: My son and i were on our way home when we noticed this object moving at a steady pace

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting on the bus to take me to the ferry. i was looking up at the night sky. i saw ufo tailing the jet plane.When it saw me observing it became stationary, that when i started taking pictures but cellphone malfunctioned. i knew it was a ufo when i first observed it.It was shaped exactly like cell phone about seemingly about 20,000 ft.In the sky. a few seconds later as i saw the bus approaching it moved forward a little as i was getting ready to catch the bus it rapidly  went the opposite direction. it was simply amazing.I asked the driver did he see it,he said he wasn't sure.
 im still astonished and amazed at seeing what i know was a ufo. unfortunately i had to go to my destination. i believe the half red and green lighted craft caused my camera 
 to malfunction.Hopefully someone else witnessed this event.I just could'nt believe, but it really did happen. ive been just wondering why me and why did stop to observe me.Again if i didn't have maybe i could observed its path.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was waiting on the bus to take me to the staten island ferry. i arrived at the bus stop at 9pm. i was watching the night sky a jet plane seemed to be leaving from ewr airport.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard looking at the moon it was a very bright that night so i took a picture of it weeks later i looked at the picture and i see another light in the picture to the left side downward from the moon so i enlarge the picture and i seen a triangular shaped object which looks to be a light in each corner of it  looks like many of the other pictures people have sent in of triangular ufos i live close to mcguire air force base but this does not look like a plane
content.summary: Triangular with 3 lights one in each corner

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend works second shift in new haven, he left work at 12:20 and once on 91 north in the area of north haven he told me he saw a bright light speeding as fast as he has ever seen go past him , he slowed down to around 35 miles per hour and was going to take a video  ( which he said after the event he definitely should have because he had enough time to do so but did not because he was so enthralled with what he saw). after the craft zoomed by (at this point it was just a light) it sstopped completely and hovered to the west i believe and he said it was triangle in shape, black, had 3 lights one on each tip of the triangle and the center light was still lite (the one that originally got his attention). then it just disappeared. 
so in a nutshell he say a super fast flying light which caught his eye, he slowed and watched it, it turned into a triangle when the other lights came on and it was the size or bigger of his chevy pick truck and black.
i was not witness to this but when he got home he woke me up and was telling me he thinks he's crazy for what he just saw and  can not wrap his head around it so i thought i'd let you guys know.
content.summary: Boyfriend saw what he believes maybe a ufo on his way home from work.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed reading around 11.30pm when i heard a large boom from the rear garden below my bedroom. the noise sounded like a supersonic boom but not as loud. i opened the curtains and saw at a distance of around 30 feet 2 distinct white globes hovering directly over a 6ft high ranch fence approx 6 inches above the fence side by side about 2 feet apart. i felt like the objects were examining the fence and after around 10 seconds the objects took off diagonally without a sound over our house at enormous speed without any noticeable acceleration. i checked the fence the day after and noted that the painted white fence had brown marks in the area where the objects had been similar to what would happen if a blowtorch had been played over the paint. i did not report the matter due to fear of ridicule given my previous experience.
content.summary: Large boom then observed two white globes hovering over fence which took off at amazing speed

content.detailedDescription:
1. i, and my family where watching from our car new years eve rockets. 
2. saw light triangel in dark spot of the sky. 
3. thought it was parachuit lights. 
4. then saw lights rotate very slowly to the left 180 degrese timed it 5 min.  then bottom light started moving slowly, to east. observed light  4-5 min to approx se. two remaining lights where stationary. 
5. i am a licensed pilot, so i found the happening highly interesting.  new years eve there is no air traffic and airports are closed and the whole episode was in horisontal - and stationary attitude 
6. the family got bored so we drove home.  i have never seen a ufo before or since.  
sorry i do not remember the year exactly.
content.summary: Triangel light rotadet counter clokw 180 in 5 min,  bottom light left to se  took 4-5 min

content.detailedDescription: Whilst locking up the garage at our property i was inside the garage in total blackness checking the doors when i had an intense feeling that i was being watched by something - somehow i knew that this object was above me. i left the garage and feeling very scared looked upwards and saw an oval shaped bright orange light with clear distinct edges hovering between the branches of a very large sycamore tree about 25 feet above me between 3 to 4 foot in length. i stood there amazed and the object started to slowly descend and approach me through the tree branches at which point i panicked and ran down a long path and two flights of steps in a record time into the house.I did tell my parents but they did not believe me and i did not report this or another sighting due to feeling ridiculed. i felt like the object was watching me and observing my reactions.
content.summary: Object that moved between trees and descended towards me

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed the light as i was traveling to store in the south sky. at first is seemed like the light from an aircraft, specifically a helicopter due to is altitude. when i arrived at store, i observed the object for a minute or so and heard no sounds. it hovered and seemed to not change altitude or direction. i went into store for 30 min or so. when i came out of store object was in the west. it was just as bright but seemed further away. as i got home, i put my drone in the sky to see it better. i took video of it and still shots. in one of the videos a second object is seen moving in the direction of the first object from northerly direction at a much lower altitude. this is the second time i have seen these lights in the area. first time i saw them was 6 months ago. i dismissed them as recon drones, given my proximity to the border. i filmed them this time.
content.summary: Stationary object that traversed sky from south to nortwest over a period of 45 min. there was a second object spotted. i have drone video

content.detailedDescription: While driving on byron hwy after work, i spotted a chrome blimp object floating in the sky far but still relatively close, after about 5 minutes or so, it spun about 60 degrees, and it faded right to left being invisible, it was close enough to where i could see it slowly disappear like a cloak covering it
content.summary: Chrome bilmp hovering and spinning in place

content.detailedDescription: During ce-5 12 ships showed up ,the first appeared as an eagle shape then 11 more appeared,made a digital noise filling me with energy.I was at the pool with my kids.Also i couldnt sleep this day,the next day i was exhausted,so i took a nap,astral projected,when i woke all electronics in the house was scrambled,phones,microwave,cable,everything had to be rebooted. i was taken way out into the stars,by a figure holding my hand.But i saw them at the pool,surrounded by ppl,noone saw them but me,id taken video,and photos. after this,ships show up alot now. triggered an awakening in me...
content.summary: 12 giant orbs filled me with sound and energy

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog rocky for a walk through a wooded trail at  earl bales park on bathurst street by shepherd in north york.   it was approximately 1030 at night i  seen lights in the distance in the path i knew it couldn't be a car cause the path is too small i was expecting to see a atv or something with high beam lights on it...Instead as i approached my dog was overwhelmed with fear was crying and trying to stop me continuing on my path towards the light moments later and overwhelming fear came over me   as this was all happening i observed a craft  that was already landed with lights on it and three small beings approximately 3 feet tall frantically working on a craft as if there was a problem with it the overwhelming fear came became so strong that i had to leave the park path area  when i reach the public parking lot if you're suddenly went away,  it almost felt as if it was artificially  telepathically send into my head i wish there was a police vehicle or other witnesses to go back into the woods with me .  it was too frightening all that came into my head was being up ducted and not ever being able to come back to my planet earth again as silly as it sounds but the time is pretty real where  craft was  metallic looking in  appearance it was approximately 20 feet in diameter . 8 feet tall at the tallest point coming down to disk shape edge . it was shiny and is giving off a lot of light it was disc shaped and had three landing feet or landing pods on the ground it was landed was not hovering i did not see any doors or windows i did see three alien beings frantically working on the craft as if  they were trying to repair something .
content.summary: Walking dog wooden path , seen lights in path walk towards light disc 3 alien beings dog fear trying to stop me the overwhelming fear struck almost artificial went away from craft fear disappeared.  my hair turn gray

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from church after retrieving my cell phone, and noticed this really bright light sort of off to the left of bandera. i kept watching it and it didn't move. so i pulled over and took a few pictures of it.  uploaded pix to my fb page under 'only me' and then downloaded to my desktop so i could get a better look. upon enlarging the pictures, it appears to be like a explosion type image or something. another picture looks like it's oblong instead of round. showed it to my husband and told me to report it here, so i am. 
i am posting a picture of the moon - which was on the opposite side of the sky so that you can have a comparison picture.
content.summary: Very bright light in the sky like a very bright star

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a beautiful sunrise. as i was marveling at the beauty i took decided to take photos. when i looked at the pictures to see how they turned out i noticed the hovering lights. i will be taking pictures again in the morning to be sure they are not reflections of any kind. though i haven't know reflections to move above trees the ways these did.
content.summary: Saw them after looking during awesome sunrise

content.detailedDescription: I went to the i went to the space shuttle app seen a white duck took a picture of it it was getting close so i took another picture dan i seen something like a city took a picture of it it like it was smoke then when i went back and looked at the pictures and blow them up that's when i seen the object i don't know i just wondering if you could tell me what that i was very happy when i seen it i showed a few people the object just flew away into the darkness from daylight into the night
content.summary: I was watching the iss on my phone when i sing these objects or whatever they use
